Faculty of Engineering and Technology Agra College, Agra has been pioneering educational institute for over 19 years. It boasts of students who have achieved excellence in the field of academics and organization. We believe our sincerity, dedication and focus towards our goal. 


ABOUT PRAJJWALAN

PRAJJWALAN, the Technical and Entrepreneurial Festival organized by the student community of F.E.T Agra College, Agra has grown into most anticipated technical festival. The 12th edition will be held from 14th-16th March 2019. What sets prajjwalan apart from other technical festival is devotion of students working for it and the urge to deliver the maximum. The Competitions, events and workshops have attracted all over students from college participating and showcasing their talents and excelling in their fields.

From shows like talk-shows, events like robotics, artistry and craftsmanship like wall painting, Prajjwalan has witnessed lot of talents. Prajjwalan was started in 2006 with the aim to provide technical awareness among students and develop a platform for the technocrats to showcase their talent. 
 It is a three days festive event held in the month of April at F.E.T Agra college, Agra which attracts people from all over Agra including students academia, corporates and the general public.
Note: I do not own any external websites shown via my app special credit to https://www.shutterfly.com

PRAJJWALAN is the annual technical symposium organized by the student fraternity of F.E.T. AGRA COLLEGE, AGRA instituted for the enrichment of Engineering and Science. Started with the aim of providing a platform for the student community to assemble, ideate, interact, and share knowledge and develop and showcase their technical skill, PRAJJWALAN has now grown into West Uttar Pradesh largest Science and Technology festival owing to the dedication and perseverance of the student body orchestrating it.

PRAJJWALAN includes:
Innovative events to test the technical and general knowledge of the participant.
Intuitive workshops to nurture the abilities of the participant.
Inceptive initiatives to make society a better place to live in.
Informative guest lectures to know about how eminent personalities address an issue in their respective field of study.
Incredible shows to illustrate and enjoy the beauty of technology.

string.name: q3
string.b: How will a participant get benefited by attending PRAJJWALAN?

resources.string: PRAJJWALAN is a platform to test the abilities of a participant when exposed to a physical problem; this makes the participant aware of his strengths and weaknesses. PRAJJWALAN is a platform to bring out the innovative child hidden in every student; this refreshes the participant and gives him/her memories to cherish throughout his/her life.

string.name: q4
string.b: How is a participant’s performance in the festival recognized?

resources.string: Winner and runner-ups of every events is awarded a Certificate of Participation and Certificate of Merit along with the prize money allotted to the respective event appreciating him/her for exhibiting his/her talent throughout the festival.

string.name: q5
string.b: When and where is PRAJJWALAN going to be held?

resources.string: PRAJJWALAN 2K18 would be a grandiose 3-day festival to be held from 17th April to 19th April, 2018 on the campus of F.E.T Agra college, Agra.

string.name: q6
string.b: How can a participant register for it?

resources.string: All the interested participants can register themselves via app or website. The registration charges are ₹450 per applicant which is inclusive of all the events, workshops, guest lectures, initiatives and KALRAV(annual cultural fest). Student can submit registration charges to collection coordinator of their classes.

string.name: q7
string.b: How to contact via social media?
